title: The ONLY Dairy Farm I Will EVER Drink Milk From

tasks.task: Visit and talk to Jay and Katya at Bradley Nook Farm about their journey towards veganic farming.
subtasks: Describe Jay's early life on the farm and its historical context.
Discuss the cultural expectations and challenges faced by farmers in changing their practices.
Explain Jay's transition from dairy farming to veganic farming, including motivations and key decisions.
Present the impact of reducing animal numbers and the shift away from conventional livestock farming.
Describe the筹备 and plans for transitioning the farm to plant-based food production, including plans for vegetable growing and employment.
Highlight the alternative use of farm equipment and facilities for vegan product manufacturing.
Mention the support received from organizations like the Vegan Society and Refarmed in the transition.
Discuss the role of sanctuaries and animal welfare in the transition.
Emphasize the potential for other farmers to follow a similar path and the future of plant-based farming.
